data.name: Gelatine
data.detailed_description:
Gelatine is a 2D sandbox game with colony building elements and a heavy emphasis on action and moment-to-moment gameplay.

Protect your colony from invaders, defeat sophisticated bosses, and experience a wide range of game-breaking bugs since this is an Early Access title.

  • Dive right into action! Grinding is reduced to a minimum, the only limitation is your skill.
  • Forget about tedious inventory management with a village-wide storage and a skill system that doesn't take up inventory space.
  • Experiment with unique, carefully crafted abilities, where no two abilities are similar!
  • Grow a colony of NPCs and protect it from invading armies.
  • Defeat challenging bosses, then defeat them again with extra modifiers.
  • Free content updates, including brand new bugs and balancing issues!

data.short_description: A 2D sandbox game with a heavy emphasis on action and moment-to-moment gameplay, where you play as an ordinary slime trying to survive and establish a colony of fantastical creatures in a hostile environment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 600
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX 2060
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
